translations: v．预言，预示：提前预知或预告某事将要发生。
· The fortune teller foretells that I will have a great future.
算命先生预言我将来会有一个伟大的未来。

sentences.sentence: It is a kind of house oracle that often foretells things most important.
sentences.translation: 它是一种内生性神谕，常常能预言最重要的事情。

sentences.sentence: Two different school motto school foretells the future destiny of the two schools.
sentences.translation: 两个学校不同的校训预示了两个学校未来的命运。

sentences.sentence: Thus the tightening web of global interdependence foretells danger as well as opportunity.
sentences.translation: 因此，日趋紧密的全球相互依存之网既预示着风险，也预示着机遇。
